text.section:
A savings and loan association that forfeits its charter may revive the charter in accordance with Title 3, Subtitle 5 of the Corporations and Associations Article only if:
The Division Director approves the proposed articles of revival; and
The charter was forfeited for:
Failure to file an annual report with the State Department of Assessments and Taxation; or
Nonpayment of taxes.

Not later than 30 days after a savings and loan association files articles of revival with the Division Director for examination, the Director shall pass an order approving or refusing the articles of revival.
